title: The Unconventional Legend - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Alternate World   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Cultivation   Dense Protagonist   Feng Shui   Male Protagonist   Money Grubber   Older Love Interests   Romantic Subplot   Shameless Protagonist   Siblings Not Related by Blood
author: Fengling Tianxia   风凌天下
description: Who is to judge right from wrong, and who is to judge the good from the bad? In this life, I don't want any rules, I just want to do whatever my heart desires. The secret lies in the clutches of my hands, watch me domineer. I am Zuo Xiaoduo, and I choose to walk down the unconventional paths.>
